description: Screamager is a marquee / message scroller and animation player with a maximum amount of style. Amaze your friends with colorful messages and animations! Using an ultra realistic looking dot matrix display in 4bit color you can be sure your message will come across. Use it in really loud places or in places where total silence is required. Display inter-cubicle messages to your coworkers or signal eachother in the classroom. It's up to you! Use the mirror function to show messages for people to read in their rearview mirror. But that's not all! Besides messages Screamager can also playanimations, including your OWN! Visit http://screamager.com/ for more information about creating your own animations.
